item.title: Jubelio Chat
item.description: Jubelio chat is a chat application aimed for online store sellers, making it easier for sellers to reply chats from customers because chat in various e-commerce can be done in just one app, namely jubelio chat. Examples of e-commerce that can be integrated with jubelio chat are like: Shopee, Tokopedia, Bukalapak, Blibli and Lazada. Work on the jubelio chat aggregator project is done in a team, and our team specifically works on the frontend.
